results.title: Serious aortic complications in a patient with Turner syndrome.
results.text_hl: She was treated with @CHEMICAL_Growth_Hormone @CHEMICAL_MESH:D013006 @@@growth hormone@@@ from age 16 to 18 and with @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@, thyroid hormone, and estrogen.

citations.NLM: Oza NM, Siegenthaler M, Horvath K, Rosing DR, Chen MY, Arai AE, Gould HN, Bakalov V, Bondy CA. Serious aortic complications in a patient with Turner syndrome. Eur J Pediatr. 2013 May;172(5):703-5. PMID: 22923005
